name: Easy Rice Vermicelli Stir-Fry Recipe
description: This easy rice vermicelli stir-fry recipe comes together in no more than 20 minutes. It's made with simple ingredients and perfect for busy weeknights.

video.name: Let’s cook a Thai rice vermicelli recipe! #thaifood #thairecipe #ricevermicelli #cookingthaifood

recipeInstructions.text: Begin by soaking the rice vermicelli in water according to package instructions.
recipeInstructions.name: Begin by soaking the rice vermicelli in water according to package instructions.

recipeInstructions.text: In a wok over medium heat, heat oil and then sauté garlic and shallots until golden and fragrant
recipeInstructions.name: In a wok over medium heat, heat oil and then sauté garlic and shallots until golden and fragrant

recipeInstructions.text: Add palm sugar, tamarind paste, black soy sauce, fish sauce, and water. Gently let the stir-fry sauce simmer for about a minute, ensuring the palm sugar is fully dissolved.
recipeInstructions.name: Add palm sugar, tamarind paste, black soy sauce, fish sauce, and water. Gently let the stir-fry sauce simmer for about a minute, ensuring the palm sugar is fully dissolved.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the soaked rice vermicelli to the wok, stir-frying for about 3 minutes to coat each noodle with sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the soaked rice vermicelli to the wok, stir-frying for about 3 minutes to coat each noodle with sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Directly crack the eggs into the wok, stirring to blend with the vermicelli.
recipeInstructions.name: Directly crack the eggs into the wok, stirring to blend with the vermicelli.

recipeInstructions.text: Turn off the heat, add green onions and bean sprouts, and toss to mix. Serve immediately and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Turn off the heat, add green onions and bean sprouts, and toss to mix. Serve immediately and enjoy!

keywords: rice vermicell recipe, rice vermicelli stir-fry, stir-fried rice vermicelli
